name: ByrdTheatre
0:
”Alexa, ask bird theater what movies are playing tomorrow”
”Alexa, ask bird theater what movies are showing on Tuesday”
”What time is Logan playing tomorrow?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bird theater
des: Alexa has trouble retrieving showtimes for the Byrd Theatre (located in Richmond, VA), so I wrote a web scraper that will do so properly. This skill adds the capability to ask Alexa what movies are playing on a certain day at the Byrd, as well as what time a specific movie is playing on a specific day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
